Shogun (YC W18) | Full Stack Engineer/Frontend Engineer | REMOTE | https://getshogun.com | $80-$140k + 0.25-5%

Shogun is a storefront builder for eCommerce stores. We have one of the most popular apps on Shopify (https://apps.shopify.com/shogun) and BigCommerce. We bootstrapped the business to profitability and we're growing fast. The team is distributed around the world and we're looking for more engineers to join us.

On the frontend, we use React and Apollo.

On the backend, we use Rails, Graphql, Postgres, MongoDB, and have some newer services in Go.

We have big plans for the future and we're just getting started!

If you are interested to learn more, email jobs@getshogun.com with your resume and any questions you may have!
